ac46d871-cc4f-494d-8d99-ccdb88b99d5a.name: HT-A9 High Performance Home Theater System

specification.Input and Output Terminals: USB typeA(FW Update only), Ethernet, S-Center Out

specification.HDMI input: Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital plus, Dolby TrueHD, Dolby Atmos, Dolby Dual mono, DTS, DTS HD High Resolution Audio, DTS HD Master Audio, DTS ES, DTS 96/24, DTS:X, LPCM

specification.HDMI eARC: Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital plus, Dolby TrueHD, Dolby Atmos, Dolby Dual mono, DTS, DTS HD High Resolution Audio, DTS HD Master Audio, DTS ES, DTS 96/24, DTS:X, LPCM

specification.Sound Effect: Night Mode, Voice Mode, Immersive Audio Enhancement

specification.Virtual Surround Technology: 360 Spatial Sound Mapping, Dolby Surround, Nural:X

specification.Network Function: Chromecast built-in, Spotify Connect, Music Service Button, Google Home, Works with Google Assistant

specification.Features for PlayStation®5:
AUTO TONE HDR MAPPING compatible (Pass-through)*
AUTO GENRE PICTURE MODE compatible (Pass-through)*
*Requires firmware update released Spring 2022

features: A new frontier of surround sound
360 Spatial Sound that adapts to your environment
